results.title: Madras Kanchi
results.creator_credit: M Krishnaswamy, Ezra Mir and Films Division, Government of India
results.brief_description: The harbour city of Madras and the ancient towns of Kanchi and Mahibalipuram nearby. The history of Madras, its public buildings, crafts, Museum and National Gallery with sculptures and archaeological remains from Dravidian times; the Theosophical Society; music and dancing; Kanchi, one of the seven sacred cities, its masterweavers, its temples with frescoes and sculptures dating from the 8th century A.D.; Mahibalipuram with temples and sculptures cut from solid rock.
results.creator_credit_for_label: M Krishnaswamy, Ezra Mir and Films Division, Government of India

results.title: Madhya Bharat. Part 2
results.creator_credit: K Khandpur, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
results.brief_description: Several cities of Madhya Bharat, including Indore, the chief commercial city of central India, and Ujjain. Shows the many factories in Indore, the cottage industries, temple architecture and modern buildings.

results.title: Madhya Bharat. Part 1
results.creator_credit: K Khandpur, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
results.brief_description: A pictorial survey of northern Madhya Bharat. Gwalior in all its stately grandeur; its architecture and crafts; Gwalior as a modern metropolis. The towns of Chanderi and Bhelsa, further south.

results.title: Madhur Jaffrey's Indian Cookery
results.brief_description: Sixteen fabulous foolproof recipes for all those who love the exotic taste of good Indian food. Here at last is a simple, visual guide which shows exactly how you too can achieve these wonderfully subtle and absolutely authentic oriental flavours. Rated: G

results.title: Mademoiselle Striptease
results.creator_credit: Marc Allegret, Raymond Eger, Films EGE and Hoche
results.brief_description: An experimental romantic-comedy, this features Brigitte Bardot in one of her early roles as a highly sexual yet innocent figure. After leaving home to survive on her own, a young woman is lured into the world of cabaret striptease. Her shyness becomes a catalyst in her instant success as she reveals all before a demanding audience. Scripted by Roger Vadim, who introduced Bardot to the film industry, and subtitled in English. In French with English subtitles. Please Note: The poor visual quality of this film is due to the quality of the distributors sourced film masters and their taping and does not reflect on the VHS tape quality.

results.title: Madeline in London
results.creator_credit: Cassandra Schafhausen, Stephan Martiniere, Christian Davin, Ronald A Weinberg, Cinar Films and France Animation
results.brief_description: For Madeline and her friends, it is a very sad day when their dear friend Pepito has to move away. But the girls quickly forget their sorrow when they are invited to visit Pepito in London. There they decide to buy Pepito the birthday present he’s always wanted - a horse. The horse takes Madeline and Pepito on a wild ride round London (and leaves Miss Clavel searching high and low) when a trumpet blast causes him to bolt. What will the Queen think when she sees Madeline and Pepito leading the Royal Parade? And what will Pepito’s mother say when the horse eats all the flowers, apples and carrots in her garden? Join the fun as Madeline finds the answers in this beautifully animated, song-filled adventure. Based on the book by Ludwig Bemelmans and narrated by Christopher Plummer.

results.title: Madeline at cooking school. Madeline and the singing dog.
results.creator_credit: Stan Phillips, DIC Entertainment and Family Channel
results.brief_description: Madeline at cooking school: Madeline, the girls and Pepito prepare an awful meal for Lord Cucuface. He enrols them at the famed Cordon Bleu School for cooking lessons with some delicious results! “Madeline and the singing dog”: Genevieve is thrown out of the opera for barking. She is dognapped by a man who wants her to to perform in his dinner theatre. Madeline convinces her favourite canine to give up the life of a star and return to the old house where she is loved by all.

results.title: Madeline and the treasure hunt. Madeline and the mummy.
results.brief_description: When a newspaper sponsers a treasure hunt, Madeline and her friends decide to look for the chest of money. On the way, they help many people and though they don’t get the treasure are well rewarded for their kind acts in “Madeline and the treasure hunt.” Madeline and her friends visit Egypt and are cursed with bad luck by a mummy they encounter. However Madeline discovers the Mummy’s secret in “Madeline and the mummy” and saves the day.

results.title: Madeline and the soccer star. Madeline and the toy factory.
results.creator_credit: Stan Phillips, DIC Entertainment and Family Channel
results.brief_description: Madeline’s country cousin comes to town. Andre is not just a country bumpkin and good gardener but also an excellent soccer player. “Madeline and the soccer star”: Andre saves the day for the girls by winning the big match. “Madeline and the toy factory”: Madeline is accidentally boxed and sold as a doll to a disabled girl. The girl is devastated when Madeline reveals her true identity but soon discovers new friends.
results.title_for_label: Madeline and the soccer star. Madeline and the toy factory.

results.title: Madeline and the gypsies
results.creator_credit: Cassandra Schafhausen, Stephan Martiniere, Christian Davin, Ronald A Weinberg, Cinar Films and France Animation
results.brief_description: Narrated by Christopher Plummer, this is another Madeline adventure based on the popular books by Ludwig Bemelmans. Pepito and Madeline have been left on top of the ferris wheel and the weather has turned from bad to rotten. Luckily the strong man, the Clown and the elephant rescue them and the adventurous pair join the gypsy circus. They love to swim in a pool while the other children have to go to school, and they love never to be told to brush their teeth or go to sleep. However along the way, they develop a lion-sized case of homesickness. They miss their families, their friends, their clean clothes and their beds. Still, Miss Clavel hasn’t forgotten them. She visits the circus with their friends - and happy is how this story ends!
